channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaWiki -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaWiki -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-0362|2024-09-16T20:22:32.537Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw where the "Mark all pages visited" on the watchlist does not require a CSRF token.

item.title: CVE-2017-0366|2024-09-16T16:13:20.587Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw allowing to evade SVG filter using default attribute values in DTD declaration.

item.title: CVE-2017-0369|2024-09-16T20:58:15.383Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw, allowing a sysops to undelete pages, although the page is protected against it.

item.title: CVE-2017-0361|2024-09-16T21:07:38.929Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains an information disclosure flaw, where the api.log might contain passwords in plaintext.

item.title: CVE-2017-0372|2024-09-16T16:27:46.256Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki%20%28syntaxhighlight%20extension%29
item.description: Parameters injection in the SyntaxHighlight extension of Mediawiki before 1.23.16, 1.27.3 and 1.28.2 might result in multiple vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2017-0365|2024-09-16T18:03:35.711Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a XSS vulnerability in SearchHighlighter::highlightText() with non-default configurations.

item.title: CVE-2017-0363|2024-09-16T19:21:14.211Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 has a flaw where Special:UserLogin?returnto=interwiki:foo will redirect to external sites.

item.title: CVE-2017-0364|2024-09-16T18:29:54.846Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw where Special:Search allows redirects to any interwiki link.

item.title: CVE-2017-0370|2024-09-16T17:02:56.884Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw were Spam blacklist is ineffective on encoded URLs inside file inclusion syntax's link parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-0505|2024-09-16T18:48:38.021Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains a flaw where BotPasswords can bypass CentralAuth's account lock
